name: The Harvest (itch)
description:
Stay calm through the dark woods after a long day.

PICO-8 cartridge for Fall/Halloween horror game.  Can you make it through the woods?  Playing in fullscreen, with headphones, and in the dark is highly recommended!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - move
  • z or c - interact
  • x or v - (hold) stay facing the same direction while walking
